attributes.action: Stop the Home Office from the shameful bashing of immigrants already in the UK by curbing the extortionist charges for visa services to migrants in the UK. E.g increases from £260 to £500 for settlement visas and £335 to £750 for Indefinite leave to remain visas. This does not compare in anyway for similar services rendered to British nationals anywhere in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
